issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
The problem is that unfortunately, MV3 extension cannot update filters due to Google policy, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rules to user rules:
```adblock
meilleure-innovation.com#$#body { overflow: auto !important; }
meilleure-innovation.com#$##detect-modal { display: none !important; }
meilleure-innovation.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-stack-trace', 'document.createElement', 'doTest')
meilleure-innovation.com##.a-wrap:not(:has(>*))
meilleure-innovation.com##.a-wrap:has(> div[id])
```

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://hochi.news/tag/社会](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhochi.news%2Ftag%2F%E7%A4%BE%E4%BC%9A) ### Comment > Two issues: > > 1. AdShield issue. Only reproduced on Safari. Awkward white space at the top and bottom of the page, and gets triggered after you launch AdGuard's Assistant or sometimes even just wait for a moment. I try adding `hochi.news` to tinyShield's URL list and it works well. I'm not sure why it's not reproduced on Chrome. > > 2. The notification banner at the bottom right of the page should be blocked. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/9swxc8ulg0kc8g8084oo4co44k04g4oqzczackzyhw.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

AdShield issue. Only reproduced on Safari. Awkward white space at the top and bottom of the page, and gets triggered after you launch AdGuard's Assistant or sometimes even just wait for a moment. ### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://hochi.news/tag/社会](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhochi.news%2Ftag%2F%E7%A4%BE%E4%BC%9A) ### Comment > Two issues: > > 1. AdShield issue. Only reproduced on Safari. Awkward white space at the top and bottom of the page, and gets triggered after you launch AdGuard's Assistant or sometimes even just wait for a moment. I try adding `hochi.news` to tinyShield's URL list and it works well. I'm not sure why it's not reproduced on Chrome. > > 2. The notification banner at the bottom right of the page should be blocked. ### Screenshots

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body: Fixed, update will be available in the next patch. Please also read [the first post](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/216149#issue-3548729912).

### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

yahoo.com##div[data-content="å»£å‘Š"]:not(#sda-MAST-iframe) has been made redundant by yahoo.com##div[data-content="å»£å‘Š"]:not(#sda-MAST-iframe)
||waipian*.com/statics/recommend/ has been made redundant by ||waipian*.com/statics/recommend/
csdn.net###kp_box_www_swiper has been made redundant by csdn.net###kp_box_www_swiper
iplark.com##body > div:not([class]):not([style]) has been made redundant by iplark.com##body > div:not([class]):not([style])
||xxsmtz10.com^ has been made redundant by ||xxsmtz10.com^
||kai5741.xyz^ has been made redundant by ||kai5741.xyz^

### Proposed solution

Clean up Chinese duplicate rules

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: Clean up Chinese duplicate rules
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Add additional Snapchat metrics filters
issue.body: Hi, I was trying to understand how Snapchat communicates with Fiddler, and I found these three telemetry endpoints. https://web.snapchat.com/web-blizzard/web/send https://api-kit.snapchat.com/com.snap.camerakit.v3.Metrics/SetOperationalMetrics https://api-kit.snapchat.com/com.snap.camerakit.v3.Metrics/SetBusinessEvents

yep, only to web.

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
Note to block the ads you should enable `advanced protection`.

issue.title: ref.rbauction.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://ref.rbauction.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fref.rbauction.com)
### Comment
> The main webpage of https://www.rbauction.com/ has a center focus on bringing you to an auction near you.
> When clicking on the "View items" button, it redirects to the `ref.rbauction.com` domain, which in turn, takes you to the right page of rbauction.com.  However, AdGuard blocks `ref.rbauction.com` , therefore does not allow this part of the website to work :(
> 

### Screenshots

AdShield issue. Only reproduced on Safari. Awkward white space at the top and bottom of the page, and gets triggered after you launch AdGuard's Assistant or sometimes even just wait for a moment. ### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://hochi.news/tag/社会](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhochi.news%2Ftag%2F%E7%A4%BE%E4%BC%9A) ### Comment > Two issues: > > 1. AdShield issue. Only reproduced on Safari. Awkward white space at the top and bottom of the page, and gets triggered after you launch AdGuard's Assistant or sometimes even just wait for a moment. I try adding `hochi.news` to tinyShield's URL list and it works well. I'm not sure why it's not reproduced on Chrome. > > 2. The notification banner at the bottom right of the page should be blocked. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/9swxc8ulg0kc8g8084oo4co44k04g4oqzczackzyhw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/h57ffhpk03s4ocwc804gwowgg44ogsc8f6xt61f420.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/216077#issuecomment-3441439974
>数ヶ月前から広告が表示されました

コンテンツブロッカーのバグが疑われますので、一度、Safariの設定（iOSの設定アプリ→Safari）からコンテンツブロッカーをすべて無効化してから再度有効化し、Safariを再起動してください。次に、AdGuardアプリを開いて右上の回転する矢印を押しフィルタの更新をし、１分以上このウィンドウを開いたままにしておいてください。また、有効化されたフィルタが少し多すぎます。EasyListはAdGuard ベースに含まれているので不要です。
